input.sentences: who does n't love going on a tour
the local architecture is always interesting
i love when there is a reenactment to go along with it
the walls are very interesting to look at it
sometimes it sad when the tour ends
output.sentences: Leo was taking a tour around the city until he found a love letter.
In that love letter,it said, go to local architecture in midtown.
Upon arrival, there was an reenactment of the the towns history and he fell in love with it.
He headed towards the walls to rest, until he spotted another letter.
At the end the letters he found ended up giving him a tour of the whole city but at last he became sad knowing it had to end.
